PromotionPartyUsage.name: PromotionPartyUsage
PromotionPartyUsage.description: Represents the details of number of times a promotion has been used by a customer.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with the organization that has used the promotion.

AdditionalAttributeInfo.description: Specifies the details of the additional promotional attribute for Contact, Account or a member in JSON format.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact associated with the person who has used the promotion.

IssuedVoucherCount.description: The number of vouchers that have been issued to the customer as the associated promotion’s reward.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: ID of the loyalty program member who has used the promotion.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

OrderCount.description: The number of orders for which the customer has applied the promotion.

PartyId.description: ID of the person or the organization that has been provided the discount.

PointsCredited.description: The number of points that have been credited to a loyalty program member as the associated promotion’s reward.

PromotionId.description: Required. ID of the promotion for which the customer’s usage is tracked.

Type.description: The type of customer for whom the promotion usage is tracked.

UsageCount.description: The number of times a party has used a promotion.
